extensionDescription.message: Send selected text to AI via the right-click menu.

customLanguageLabel.message: Or enter a custom language in the language-country format:

contextMenuTextChatGPT.message: Send selected text to ChatGPT in {language}

contextMenuTextGemini.message: Send selected text to Gemini in {language}

contextMenuTextClaude.message: Send selected text to Claude in {language}

contextMenuTextPOE.message: Send selected text to POE in {language}

contextMenuTextTranslationChatGPT.message: Translate selected text to {language} with ChatGPT

contextMenuLinkTranslationChatGemini.message: Translate selected text to {language} with Gemini
